content: ccccrrrroooocccchhhheeeetttteeeedddd ppppooootttt hhhhoooollllddddeeeerrrrssss © 2008 samantha farrell http //on-hooks-and-needles blogspot com hook size h 5 5 mm yarn lily sugar n cream cotton yarn 2 skeins of main color sage green <1 skein of second color cornflower blue ~1/3 skein of third color ecru project finished size approximately 9 x 9 gauge not really important special stitches hhdc herringbone half-double_crochet yo insert hook into next st yo draw yarn through st and first loop on hook yo draw through both loops on hook pattern notes when switching colors be sure to leave enough of a tail to weave in the ends pattern squares make 4 with main color sage green chain 31 row 1 in third chain from hook hhdc continue hhdc to end of chain should end with 29 hhdc turn row 2 chain 2 counts as first hhdc hhdc in each stitch across total of 30 stitches turn row 3-16 repeat row 2 row 17 switch to second color cornflower blue chain 2 hhdc in each stitch across total of 30 stitches turn row 18-19 repeat row 17 row 20 switch to third color ecru chain 2 hhdc in each stitch across total of 30 stitches turn row 21 repeat row 20 row 22 switch to main color sage green chain 2 hhdc in each stitch across total of 30 stitches turn row 23 repeat row 22 row 24 repeat row 22 fasten_off weave in ends assembly take 2 squares and decide which side is the best side personal preference place wrong sides the interior sides you won t see facing one another make sure stripes line up in the corner where the loop will be again personal preference join the third color ecru chain 2 counts as hhdc hhdc in corner space hhdc evenly all around and 3 hhrc in corners all hhdc should go through both squares to join them when you get back to the chain 2 hhdc in corner should now have 3 hhdc including chain 2 join to chain 2 do not fasten_off unless you don t want the loop - directions below making the loop chain 8 and join to third hhdc of corner turn hhdc in each chain 8 stitches fasten_off leaving long tail weave in ends reinforcing loop if necessary copyright information this pattern is for the personal use of the buyer only no copies and no forms of distribution are allowed you may not in any form reproduce transmit or distribute this pattern whatsoever this encompasses any part of the pattern itself including but not limited to images diagrams and text without prior written consent of the designer purchasing the pattern does not remove the copyright protection of the pattern you may print out this pattern for your own personal use but you cannot distribute it whether for free or for sale in any form through any venue including but not limited to photocopying other electrical or mechanical means recording or any other information storage and/or retrieval system without
